1552122111121111121112112121212111111121.content:
Groaning, The Invisible Blimp opened her eyes and saw blue.

Blue above her, blue below her, blue behind her, and blue in front of her. She had room to move only a few feet and took a step, her rubbery body bouncing against the floor of whatever structure she was in. Her foot sank into the rubbery material of her cell and Susan waited for Titania to reveal herself.

But no monitor hung down, no heavy steps or doors opened to reveal her enemy.

She called out for anyone to answer her and received silence.

At least for all of two minutes.

"Finally up, Incredible Fatso?"

"Titania! What are you up to?"

"Up to? Why nothing bad, I assure you. I just wanted you and your husband to have some quality time together."

"My husband? What are you-" but Susan stopped talking as she noticed the steady inhale and exhale of her chamber. "Reed! What happened to you?!"

"Your husband is quite the blimp now Susan. I hope you appreciate the irony. He had to eat for two whole days to get to the size he is now and putting you in there was no easy task for his mouth, elastic though it may be. And speaking of elastic, I recommend you don't try and blow up too much in your elastic form. He's pretty full as it is."

Susan, who changed into her flesh and blood form after Titania's warning, tensed up.

She heard machinery moving outside and then saw a light appear, no doubt Reed's mouth being forced open, a funnel appearing.

"Now Susan, we're going to fill up your husband even more. It's quite painful. At least I think it is, he was screaming in pain a few hours ago. You should know what to do if you don't want him to suffer while we fill him up yet again."

Milk soon started flowing down that funnel and Susan was worried that it was from Iron Maiden. Still there was only one way to find out. Cupping a bit of it, she took a sip.

Cool, creamy, but no fullness.

Still, Susan had no time to relax, as she noticed the milk had already covered her fat foot. So, grabbing the funnel, Susan did the only heroic thing she could at the moment: she shoved the funnel into her own mouth.

Outside, Titania listened as she heard swallowing, much different from Reed's own, and grinned. Signaling to Moonstone, the driver of the truck, Titania waited with baited breath.

Moonstone pressed a button, the funnel now drawing milk from another tank.

Inside Reed, Susan had noticed the slowing of the flow but it lasted only a moment. Thinking nothing of it, she resumed swallowing as much milk as she could until she felt it. The fullness...

But she felt something else besides that...she felt...compelled to drink more.

Eyes widening as she realized Titania's scheme, Susan tried to pry her mouth away but it was far too late.

Iron Maiden's milk mixed with Yellowjacket's pollen had trapped her. Reed was too stuffed with both his wife and food to be anything but a round sphere, no matter how much he tried to move or speak and inside him his wife grew fatter and fatter.

Hundreds of yards beyond the stuffed sphere of Reed Richards and the steadily growing prisoner that was his wife, Ben Grimm opened his eyes, moaning a bit.

Something was pressing on him and when he realized what it was, the Thing tried to back away but even his great strength was useless against the mountain of pastries he was buried under.

There had to be over ninety tons of baked goods on top of him if he couldn't move it.

Hearing the sound of someone eating, Ben looked over and saw She Hulk, her body the skinniest Ben had seen since she started being a sumoheroine. But as he craned his neck, he saw She Hulk's huge gut and bulging buttocks as she crammed pastry after pastry into her mouth.

She was grunting at Ben, motioning with her hands as best she could despite the fact that they were growing fatter by the minute. Ben caught on and sighed, knowing she was right.

The only way out was to eat.

Taking a pastry, Ben bit into it, stuffing his face to aid his friend the only thing he could do in this situation.

Johnny awoke in a new tank of milk, the fullness having subsided. He opened his mouth to call for aid when some of the milk managed to trickle in. Once again the fullness returned and the Torch kept his mouth shut for once in his life as he felt more milk enter the tank from above, Johnny frantically trying to keep his head above water.

Miss Massive moaned as she woke up, Black Widow calling her name.

"I'm alright, I think," Miss Massive said.

"Oh no, no you're really not," Nightshade's voice rang out.

Miss Massive and Black Widow tried to get to their feet but were stopped by a butt bump from Lady Sumo, who had been standing behind the women the whole time.

Groaning and dizzy, both sumoheroines almost made it to their feet before a pair of flabby arms embraced them in a hug and more importantly, embraced their faces directly under both of those huge armpits.

Sweat was breathed in through both women's noses and the arms kept them there for some time.

Finally, after half an hour, and both sumo heroes almost passed out, the arms released them.

Their minds were no longer their own.

Nightshade beamed at her two new slaves.

"Miss Massive, turn yourself into a balloon and float up until you hit the highest point in this place. Then make yourself crash to the ground under your weight. When you wake up from that, do it again and again, understand?"

"Yes Mistress," Miss Massive moaned in pleasure, swiftly doing what Nightshade ordered, the sumo woman now a fat balloon floating to the ceiling, still a hundred feet away.

"As for you Wobbly, do you see that hole?" Wobbly turned her fat body around and indeed saw a huge hole, large enough for a hundred Wobbly Webspinners to fit in.

"Yes, I do."

"Good. Jump down in that hole and web yourself up, becoming so fat that you'll be stuck down there, got it?"

Wobbly nodded and jumped down.

The whole was twenty feet deep but luckily Wobbly's big butt saved her from injury.

As soon as she was cushioned, Wobbly spun her webs, cocooning herself.

But Wobbly didn't grow fat in one big gain.

Instead some heroic part of Wobbly's subconscious added one pound at a time, fulfilling Nightshade's order to get fat, but at Wobbly's own pace.

A similar part of Miss Massive's now light head was taking it's sweet time raising Miss Massive up.

But that was all the resistance they could offer and with each foot of height or pound gained, they were still dooming themselves.

"Wakey, wakey, Wasp!"

Janet came to a few moments later and saw Yellowjacket before her, in human form. But Wasp was somehow in her pixie size. Thinking of her human size, she was shocked when she didn't change.

"Oh, did I forget to mention the power-draining nanites in your body? Silly me."

Wasp wasn't quick enough to avoid Yellowjacket's hand as she grabbed her. Brought up to Yellowjacket's face, Janet could do nothing as her enemy dropped a large plastic bag over her tiny body, yellow pollen covering her from head to toe.

Removing Janet from the bag, Yellowjacket then placed the ravenous sumo hero into a specially designed cell.

It was a wasp's hive, constructed entirely out of pastries.

Yellowjacket laughed as Janet ate, Janet's fat fingers trying in vain to summon energy to blast Yellowjacket with until her fingers gripped the floor of her nest, ripping a chunk out and barely chewing before another was crammed into her mouth.

Greer Grant awoke to find herself rising and lowering. When she tried to speak, the only thing that came out of her mouth were meows.

The reason for her rising and lowering was made evident as Greer's kitten form tried to move. Her belly was touching the ground and so swollen that her paws would never reach the stone beneath her.

"Hello kitty," Iron Maiden's voice said, louder than normal in Greer's feline ears.

All of a sudden, Greer heard a sound that sent shivers up and down her spine.

It was water, and it was closing in on her.

As a tiger, she didn't mind water.

As a furry human, she loved water.

But in her kitten form, Greer had discovered during the vacation, she was absolutely terrified of it.

Meowing, the sound almost like sobs, Greer tried to move but her bloated belly made that impossible as the water engulfed her fat stomach.

Thinking she would drown, Greer raised a paw and swiped at Iron Maiden, defiant to the last. But her paw was grabbed by the Frightful Sumo and Greer was lifted up, out of the water, and towards a massive breast.

A nipple was forced past her lips and the milk flowing into her already stuffed belly expanded it even further, Greer meowing in pain from her stuffed gut.

"Shh, don't worry kitten, just relax and enjoy your final stuffing."

Titania had won.

She couldn't believe it, she had actually defeated the Sumo Six, humiliating them at the same time, as viewers all over the world had seen their fate as it happened live.

Slapping her big belly, Titania gave a roaring laugh.

Again, it would have been a selection at the villain Oscar's if her laugh wasn't cut off halfway through.

The reason for this interruption was the large hole blasted into the side of the bakery, two fat shadows soon revealing themselves to be...

“I wouldn’t be so sure of that you bloated bag of flab!” A heroic voice shouted.

Titanic Gut turned around angrily to find herself face to face with the Sumo Sisters, as after seeing what had happened to Susan and the others thanks to the sumovillianesses broadcast they had made their way to the bakery as quickly as possible.

The leader of the Frightful Sumos just laughed at this however. “Please, I’ve already defeated the Sumo Six and what was left of the Fantastic Four, what chance do you two have against me?”

There was a whacked gleam in Medusa’s eyes as she answered.

“Well why don’t we get this fight started and find out?”

Iron Maiden, Yellowjacket, and Nightfat went for Thunder Butt while Titanic Gut, Lady Bullseye and Moonbelcher went for Fatdusa.

Yellowjacket was the first of the Frightful Sumos to fall, she tried to blast the younger Inhuman sister with some of her pollen, however the orange haired Princess simply counter attacked with a blast of wind that blew the stuff right back into Yellowjacket’s face taking her mind completely off the fight.

Nightfat tried to capture Thunder Butt’s mind with her pheromones but a high pressure blast of water from Crystal got her all “squeaky clean” and prevented her from being able to build up enough of her scent, as well as knocking her off of her feat.

Iron Maiden let loose with a blast of milk but Crystal evaporated it with fire before quickly blowing it back in their faces with a gust of air, causing both of them to absorb the stuff into their bodies the same way that Johnny Storm had been tricked.

Soon both of them found themselves dealing with painfully full stomach’s that kept them from being able to fight effectively.

As for Fatdusa’s fight, she dealt, when Moonbelcher let loose with an energy burp, she simply created an effective shield for herself out of her own bodies flab.

She then counter attacked by picking her up with her hairs (through which Moonbelcher could not drain her flab) and hurling her at Lady Bullseye just as she was about to shot “Lets Sumo!” Inadvertently having her power take effect on her and Moonbelcher instead of her and Fatdusa!

That left only Titanic Gut who no matter how powerful she as, was no match for an opponent like Fatdusa who could attack from countless angles.

“Ughh... how did you do this?” Titanic Gut complained as she was slammed yet again against the walls of her bakery.

“Simple...” Fatdusa declared even as her hairs were also finishing off Lady Bullseye after she finished defeating Moonbelcher in a sumo match. “Unlike the rest of you, the Sumo Sisters are true sumo warriors! We have trained with the great master Rei to learn how to properly use our powers... the rest of you are just pale imitations!”

The Inhuman queen then promptly delivered one more slam that knocked Titanic Gut unconscious...

1552122111121111121112112121212111111121.content:
After the Frightful Sumos were carted off to a specially designed prison, somewhere in Europe, and the Sumo Six were all freed from their traps, a weary, much larger, and depressed Sumo Six entered the Baxter Building.

Of course they showered praise on Fatdusa and Thunderbutt, offering them permanent membership on the team but the sisters refused.

"We need to be your backup. Also, starting in a month, we will be your trainers," Medusa said.

Susan agreed and left to be with her husband, her hugely obese form panting heavily after two steps.

Most of Susan's weight had settled in her butt, though her belly had increased mightily as well. She was over three tons and was far too massive to be out in the field for some time.

Wobbly Webspinner had only increased her body by one hundred pounds, bringing her up to a ton and a half in weight.

Miss Massive was the least changed of the Sumo Six and was itching to get back into action but for the sake of her friends, she would undergo the same sumo training as all of them.

The Wasp, who was still in her pixie form and would be for a few weeks or until Reed managed to get the nanites out of her, was at two tons at her tiny size. Her butt was the biggest thing about her and her appetite had increased dramatically. Flying over to Greer, who was still too full to change out of her kitten form, Wasp gave Fat Cat a belly rub.

"Urrrp!"

Greer's belly was still a hindrance and would take some time to recede even an inch, so for the moment she was the pet of the team, not that she minded that much.

She Hulk and The Thing had no muscle on them anymore, She Hulk balking a bit at the training.

"I'm still plenty strong!" She Hulk whined.

In response, Fatdusa poked She Hulk's massive body, the finger sinking into entire feet of fat coated by She Hulk's green skin.

Of the Sumo Six, She Hulk was the fattest, weighing six tons, all of it fat.

Thing was five tons, his fat gut almost a match for Reed's round proportions.

Johnny was being comforted by Crystal on one of the large couches Reed had made, the Human Torch not that heavy, only possessing a gut and a rounder butt, but he was ashamed for not being able to save his sister and the rest.

Crystal hugged him, his body sinking into her combination of flab and muscle.

To cheer him up, she farted out an element light show, Johnny smiling for the first time in days.

In Reed and Susan's room...

Reed was now two tons and still possessed a largely spherical shape, with his arms and legs mostly useless.

"Don't worry Reed, we'll get through this."

Reed merely nodded, staring at the mound of fat that was his wife.

"Do you have any muscle left?"

Susan shook her head sadly, patting her huge gut.

"All flab I'm afraid. And I can't...I can't change into my rubber form."

Reed's eyes met hers then and he embraced her as best he could.

"I just have this image of you in pain, getting rounder and rounder and my body refuses to change."

"Susan...I'm going to join you in your sumo training."

Susan's eyes widened at that.

"Really?"

"Yes, I need it if I ever want to slim down to help Janet. Also if I ever want to properly embrace you again, I should get below a ton."

Susan laughed at that and hugged him as best as she was able. Reed's arms were still at his sides and his embrace earlier was merely rubbing his big belly against her.

Susan started to sweat from the effort of hugging him and she blushed.

"I really need it to," she admitted.

Suddenly, two huge bellies roared and the fat couple blushed.

"Let's get something to eat first," Susan said, Reed agreeing with a nod.

Three months later....

"Susan, give me five pushups," Medusa ordered. Susan, body slick with sweat and panting, was clad only in a fundoshi, the traditional sumo fashion, and managed to get to her fat knees.

Susan was at two tons, losing weight thanks to a slimmer Reed managing to invent a device that aided the body in slimming up, but found most actions still incredibly tiring. And five pushups were something she had never tried before.

"One..." Susan said, sweat pouring in buckets now.

"Tw-" but Susan's fat arms failed her and she sunk to the ground.

"Looks like you're running two laps around the building," Medusa said to the large woman.

Susan groaned and got to her feet, waddling towards the super sized elevator.

She Hulk wasn't training. Instead, she was sitting on her wider butt, eating junk food.

Medusa glared as she got Jennifer slacking off.

"That's it! No more junk food! You will only be eating rice from now on! Now go join Susan and run ten laps around the building!"

She Hulk whined at first but Medusa's stomach fat turned into a snarling monster, roaring at the green fatty.

"Go!"

Nodding, She Hulk somehow got to her feet, and waddled after her team leader.

The Wasp, Wobbly Webspinner, Miss Massive, and Tigra were her best students, Medusa thought, turning to them. Most had built up the necessary muscles underneath their flab, the only exception being Tigra, who still lacked that muscle around her butt and belly, but was getting there. She had managed to turn back into her human form a month ago but was still used to being the pet of the group, something Wasp used as an excuse to treat Tigra whenever she wanted, slipping her dinner scraps under the table to the fat kitten.

Reed was also coming along nicely, the scientist now able to make things again but decided to stay with sumo training as long as Susan did.

Panting after his own latest jog around the building, he offered Medusa a smile.

"What next?"

"Take a break Reed. I know you want to go back into the lab and tinker around with things."

Smiling, Reed did just that, his fat jiggling as he waddled away.

Ben was the fastest to regain his fighting ability, whether that was due to his rocky physique or his guts, whatever the reason, the only sign of fat on the Thing was a gut that refused to slim down. But since it didn't really bother him in fighting, he kept it.

As for Johnny and Crystal...

Crystal decided to help train the other Sumo Six, but only in an advisory capacity. Her older sister would be sure to succeed, Crystal was positive about that.

As a result, Crystal, ironically, decided to soften up her sumo muscle into pure fat.

But she wasn't alone in this. Johnny had decided to join her and the two could often be found in the living room, ever expanding butts parked on the couch, each plowing through piles of junk food.

Crystal had already ballooned up to two tons and Johnny was at three hundred pounds, a massive imbalance to be sure, but Crystal liked being the largest in the relationship. It gave her a strong sense of her own power.

Finishing her jog, with her friend She Hulk still having several laps to go, Susan waddled into the elevator and thought about that fateful day all those months ago when she decided to become a sumo.

Things had come full circle, as if karma had at first rewarded, then punished, then finally gave her her wish. Susan was going to be a proper sumo now and would make sure to curb her more gluttonous side, though the thought of an extra large deep dish pizza was calling to her, Susan ignored it.

Once the elevator had opened at the top floor, Susan grinned as she waddled towards her larger family.

She was fat, a sumo, and happy and nothing could ever break the bonds she held with her friends and family members.

Castle Doom...

Six bloated, stuffed, and thoroughly defeated villains sat on a truly massive couch their flab rubbing against one another.

Victor Von Doom strode into his newly renovated living room, his body larger than all of the Frightful Sumo's combined.

"How do you like this new punishment, ladies?"

Then Doom turned his back to them and lowered his titanic rear end, the shadow of his despotic butt looming over each sumo villain.

Titania gulped before Doom sat on them, knowing he would be back to his muscular body after he felt they had suffered this punishment enough. Then he would punish them again and again for the rest of their lives in twisted ways. Richards was his, Doom had explained their first night in his castle, his to toy with, his to transform, his to destroy.

And as Doom ground his butt into the extra "padding" that was his seat, he ate some popcorn from a large bowl and watched television, laughing maniacally at the exploits of Tom and Jerry, his favorite cartoon.

1552122111121111121112112121212111111121.content:
The story wasn't over for Titania or her fattened comrades though, bleak as their future seemed.

Doom, in one of his many stormy moods, grew bored of having the Frightful Sumos around. So he released them, forbidding them from ever entering Latveria for the rest of their flabby lives.

Each woman agreed, grateful to even be alive at this point.

Once safely back in New York, the team was still together, but now they mostly spent their days pigging out on junk food.

Finally, on a day eight months later, Titania stood up, massive body jiggling as she did so.

"We are going to have revenge on Susan and Reed for making us endure Dr. Doom!"

"I don't know about that, Gut, didn't you hear that Reed is off limits?" Moonbelcher put in.

"Details, details, all we have to do is make sure he never finds out!"

Each woman seemed skeptical at that plan but Titania's forceful personality and position as leader of the team eventually won them over.

"But first we need a few more members..." Titania said, rubbing her fourth chin in contemplation.

Two such new recruits were found a week later. Both were mutants but in appearance they were night and day.

Raven Darkholme, or Mystique, was the first. Her blue skin, yellow eyes, and red hair all gave her an exotic air and her shapely form made even the straightest woman in the room take notice. The mutant shapeshifter agreed to take the pill after being promised a large cut of the profits from any ventures.

Emma Frost, also known as the White Queen, was next. Her long blond hair and icy demeanor were clear as she listened to Titania's plan. Rubbing a palm over her trim, well-formed abs, Emma didn't reply for some time.

"Alright, I'll join. But I want a few of those pills to change some annoying X Men after we're done with this mission, okay?"

Titania and the rest agreed.

Mystique allowed Emma to go first and watched as The White Queen downed her pill.

Eight room shaking belches later, Emma had gone from the White Queen to The Obese Queen.

The most prominent part of Emma to gain was her butt, with her belly the next biggest. Rubbing her now enormous gut and butt, Emma slapped her fat a few times, enjoying the jiggling and ripples all over her seven hundred pound body.

It was odd that she didn't weight nearly as much as the others when they had changed but they overlooked it. Emma then felt something different about her powers and focused on her diamond form. But it wasn't diamond that Emma changed into. Instead, her whole form turned purple. You could actually see right through her. Reaching out a now goopy hand, Emma licked one of fingers.

"I'm...I'm...grape jelly!"

She then slammed her own hand hard into her gut, some of Emma splattering away from her. This chunk of Emma soon formed into a tiny version of Emma and Emma's own jelly body soon regained what it had lost.

"Interesting..." Emma said. Her mental powers were unchanged but this new form was fascinating. "Call me Jelly Belly from now on," Emma said.

Mystique then took her pill and belched heartily for some time.

Once that was over, Mystique was eleven feet tall and much wider. With the fattest belly out of any of the women there and the largest butt as well, she was truly huge. Mystique estimated her body to now weigh close to a ton, the slightest movement sending wave after wave of flab into motion.

Focusing her powers, Mystique felt something different. Changing into Wolverine, she focused harder and soon enough adamantium claws escaped her hands. There was no pain. Changing again, Mystique became Emma Frost in her slim, original form, turning into diamond soon after.

"I can now have the powers of the people I turn into and not just the appearance! Call me Massive Mystery!"

Titania grinned at her new team.

"I think we need to change our name. We are no longer the Frightful Sumos! Instead we are the Terrible Tubbies!"

Somewhere on the Mediterranean Sea, aboard the SS Fatty, Susan Storm shivered.

"What's wrong honey?" Reed asked.

Both were now around four hundred pounds of fat and grateful for the added mobility, enjoying a cruise through Greece and Italy that should take three months.

"I just felt cold, nothing to be worried about," Susan replied, though deep down she had a foreboding about the future.

1552122111121111121112112121212111111121.content:
Of course as it turned out the shiver that Susan felt going up her body turned out to be far from nothing... As Susan and Reed Richards were two of the worlds biggest celebrities (not even taking into account their weight) it was hard for anything they did to stay out of the public eye for long, even keeping in mind Susan's powers of invisibility.

While Surge can’t generate her own power, she can process that food into electricity for the base. Willing to give it a shot the plan proceeded and after two days the room was all set up. The only thing left was to bring in the now immobile Surge.

Predictably Surge was not too thrilled about the prospect, throwing many curses at her captor. Surge’s willpower was going to be put to the test as Titania had a plan to break it down. As with most prisoners of the FrightFul Six, Surge’s appetite had been greatly enhanced. Using this fact to her advantage, Titania set up an electric feeding mechanism that would be powered by Surge’s new station as a generator. If Surge wanted to sate her new appetite, she would have to power the base.
1552122111121111121112112121212111111121.title: PlasmaBlob

choices: Back in the present
1552122111121111121112112121212111111121.content:
While Surge’s strong willpower helped her fight the temptation for nearly two days, eventually she had to give in to her bodies needs. She started to let go of the power she had been holding onto from her failed break-in, which in turn activated her feeding tool. She had thought about trying to overload the system with an insane spike of electricity but the scientists had modified her gauntlets into to not allow such an excess output. For now, she decided to try to enjoy the deliciously addictive treats.

After two weeks of her new job as the FrightFul sumo’s personal generator, Surge could no longer ignore the reality of her situation. No rescue would be coming to break her out of here. Even if she did get rescued it would take a lot of work to slim her back down to a mobile size. So like most of the super villain’s captives before her, she decided to stop fighting back against them and try to make the most of her situation.

Surge quickly learned that this was a smart choice as Titania tends to reward compliance of her pets with gifts. After Titania had noticed Surge’s new behavior, Titania had ordered the scientists install a voice-activated library of books for her captive. Surge was ecstatic about development as her first week on the job had been quite boring, with the only the occasional chat with workers to pass the time.

As more time passed her situation greatly improved to the point where she didn't mind her new life too badly. This change was heavily due to one of the brand new recruit named Rose. Evidently, the girl had been a college level genius in electrostatics. After acing her finals, her professors wanted to provide her an environment in which she could grow her skills. Since Titania’s lab had quickly become one of the most advanced labs in the world, they asked if she could work there. The team was skeptical of letting a college kid work here, so to discourage her they send her a challenging problem of upgrading their reactor. When they got a response back in two days, they initially thought the girl had resigned her application. After opening the email they were shocked to find two different theoretical upgrades to their system.

While this definitely earned her a spot at the lab, the older scientists were not too thrilled with this new addition. What they initially saw as a distraction in the lab became a threat to their job hood. The team very much enjoyed their positions as Titania’s favorites and became worried this girl would replace one of them. They devised a new plan of giving the girl the cold shoulder to make her want to not work their anymore.

This plan fell apart on Rose’s first day in the lab, as she was the most adorable girl they had ever met. She could best be described as having a face and personality of a stereotypical shy girl with the body of a cheerleader. This lead to half the staff wanting to adopt her with the other half wanting to sleep with her. All of the attention did leave Rose a little overwhelmed, making her lose her voice a for her first work days. Eventually Rose had gotten past her initial shy phase and quickly tried to befriend everyone in the lab crew, even the lab’s prisoner Surge.

The girl had apparently been rescued from the X-Men back when she was a teenager in high school and was quite the fan of the team. She asked if Surge could tell her what it was like being part of the team. After seeing the excitement in her eyes and having grown tired of reading, Surge was happy to talk about some of her exciting adventures. Surge barely made a dent in her past before one of the scientists asked if Rose had finished her readings yet. Rose quickly finished her previously forgotten work and promised Surge to return to hear the rest of it. From that day on the two had quickly become friends, with Rose’s visits becoming a daily occurrence. They had moved on from only talking about Surge’s adventures, discussing a plethora of topics such as books, movies, and sometimes just daily life.

During one of their sessions, out of the blue Rose asked if Surge was happy. Surge was caught off guard by this question, who hadn't really thought about the dramatic change her life took since her capture. While she did miss her career as an X-men, she didn't want to worry her new friend of troubles outside of her control. So she told her that she was fine, though joked about being sick of reading books all the time. The answer seemed to satisfy Rose, though she quickly ran off with the excuse of forgetting to take some readings.

The following day Surge awoke to a pleasant surprise as her library had now gained video capability. When Surge asked Rose about the upgrade she pretended to be just as surprised by it, though a small blush on face gave her away. This day marked the start of a trend of her set up in lab greatly improving. After talking about favorite foods one day, Surge had suddenly gained a snack period where she got to choose her meal. After complaining about her uncomfortable clothes, two days later she received a brand new outfit. Eventually, she stopped trying to be subtle and asked Surge directly for everything she would be interested in having, as she was about to revamp the whole system.
1552122111121111121112112121212111111121.title: A Rose meets a Violet

choices: Continue with Titania (Capture new heroines or visit more prisoners)
Check in with some of the other's in the base(Villains or heroines)
1552122111121111121112112121212111111121.content:
Today was finally the day when that system was finally getting implemented, which is how Surge found herself in her current mess. As smart as the science team was they were still human. Someone had made a small error in the amount of mass their crane could handle lifting up. Surge embarrassingly was a tad over that amount, causing the crane to break and drop her. While drop did not physically hurt that much as she had plenty of built-in cushions, the position was not really pleasant as her face was down on the ground. Mentally it also was not reassuring on how much of a blob she truly had become. After a few minutes of waiting, Surge heard some loud stomping, followed by being risen up to the sight of a smirking of Titania

“Trying to roll away, are we? For shame I thought you liked our hospitality,” joked Titania as moved Surge to the side of the room. Surge could only roll her eyes as Titania still wore that same shit-eating grin she always seemed to wear since her capture. “Now what do you have to say Surge.”

“Thank you, mistress,” Surge choked up, knowing that the golden word would earn her some praise. While she had accepted that the fact that she had been thoroughly defeated, she still tried to hold onto her some of her pride. Lately thought even that was starting to slip as Titania induced more rewards for “desired behavior”. Looking back at Titania proved her assessment accurate as she somehow had a bigger grin than before.


With their subject out of the way, the team could finally install the last upgrades to the lab and eagerly got to work. That is except for Rose, who was left dumbstruck by the how easily Titania moved the giant girl. She heard the stories about how strong Titania was but hearing is way different than seeing. Sam, however, reminded her that Titania didn't want to be there all day so she should install her new upgrades to the system already, which got Rose into the working zone.

After a few minutes, the new and improved system was all ready for operation, only requiring the power source. Titania moved Surge back into her normal place, with the science team attaching equipment to their subject. Finally with everything in place it was up to Surge to start up the system. Surge who had gone almost two hours without eating wasted no time in powering up machines to get her snack. As the juice started flowing the staff eagerly checked their measurements finding that the systems were indeed working at a 1.5 times more efficient way. After a couple minutes the team had to take a break from their readings as Titania slowly made her way to the center of the room, seemingly to make an announcement to the team.

“Look’s like you guys did a good job,” praised Titania. “The task that was seemingly impossible before was made possible by your efforts. You guys continue to impress me and I am not one to not reward good work. So not only are the drinks on me tonight, but you can also enjoy a nice salary increase.”

This decree elicited cheers from the lab member’s. While not the most uncommon reward for success, the team were always thankful for these gifts. Luckily for them, Titania learned early on in her rulership that although threats of death definitely were handy in dealing with foes, positive reinforcement was way better long term to produce good results.

As her team went back work Titania got a chance to get a good look at all the new tech. While most of the team's effort had gone into maximizing the efficiency of the energy output, there had been a decent amount of upgrades to her prisoner’s setup. A neural-based controller was added to allow her to use controllers without the use of her immobile hands. A massaging system was added that was activate-able by voice command. She even some interesting devices to help “relieve stress”. Honestly, besides being an immobile blob, it would be hard to call Surge a prisoner and not a Queen at this point.

While Titania did approve these additions, as Surge giving up fighting her and submitted to her new mistress, she was curious why her team had asked her for these enhancements. Deciding to quell her curiously, she returned to Sam who was doing some scans with Rose.

“So Sam I gotta know, why did you guys request all these quality of life changes for plasma blob over there. She starting to grow on you guys or something,” Titania asked. While Sam seemed unfazed by the question, Rose seemed to stiffen but quickly shook it off and continued on with her work.

“Oh that’s because Rose over here, developed quite the crush on our blue giant,” Sam nonchalantly replied. This time Rose could not hold back her emotions, as she turned from her work to stare in horror at Sam. Rose looked quite nervous as she quickly turned her head towards Surge. Thankfully for her, the former X-men was seemingly too distracted with her meal to hear their conversation.

“You promised you wouldn't tell anyone that,” yelled Rose, who was balancing a look of annoyance with one of embarrassment. Remembering that Titania was also present, however, the embarrassment quickly won the battle, especially after Titania shot her a toothy grin.

“So you like big woman huh. Maybe I need to bring you to my chambers sometime,” Titania said with a flirty tone. Rose seemed to match her namesake as her crimson blush returned at full force. “Well, if you were looking for permission I don't mind some fraternization so long as you remember whose in charge here. If you want I could make her into your love pet with a little brainwashing.”

“Um no that’s okay,” muttered Rose, who seemed more relaxed with Titania’s approval. “If she doesn't like me that way I don't wanna force it, I am okay with just being friends.”

“Well, speaking of which, why don't you make sure your friend enjoys her new upgrades,” Sam inquired. “Make sure the equipment is all working up there while you are at it.”

Eager to leave the awkward conversation Rose quickly nodded her head and started making her way up to Surge. Not before Sam added that she should also ask Surge out, much to Rose’s embarrassment. With Rose hurrying away, Sam directed Titania towards the power station’s main lab area.

“There is the matter I wish to discuss with you before you head out,” stated Sam as they entered the lab. Sam directed Titania attention to one of the big monitors, which showed a holo layout of her secret base and the routes the power took to those rooms. Below the rooms was a large quantity of measurements with one particle data set that was concerning to Titania. Current power was still getting quite close to maximum power, despite the upgrades.

“As you can see we saved a little time with the new set up but we still are getting close to our peak,” Sam stated. “So either need to cut back on expansion and projects which both of us know isn't happening. Or we …”

“Need me to gather more power sources,” Titania interrupted, getting a nod from Sam. “All right I will see if we can find some more electric super heroines add to the collection.”

“Thanks, Titania,” replied Sam, who started to gather notepads to take some readings. Sam started to leave but was stopped as a powerful arm held her shoulder down.

“I gotta say every time I come down here I feel like I'm leaving with work these days. Did you forget who's the boss here,” Titania tried to threaten, but was betrayed by her cheeky expression.

“When you know what color panties your boss wears, you sometimes forgot,” joked Sam. Titania clearly did not expect that response, and in her momentary haze let go of Sam who continued on her way.
1552122111121111121112112121212111111121.title: The Bright Blue Blob Could Use Some Friends

choices: Susan really has escaped somehow...
Mystique is playing games with Mr. Flabtastic.
1552122111121111121112112121212111111121.content:
“Reed… Reed honey are you all right?” A familiar voice called out.

A large dark blue blob that had to be roughly the size of car awkwardly began to ooze and shift about. Reed Richards formerly the leader of the Fantastic Four had been put through the ringer several times by Titania and her Frightful Sumos. His rubbery body allowed him to be played with and tormented in ways that no normal person could be, be it fattening him up to the point that his own wife could be squished within his flabby form, used as a living sofa or bed, or even squeeze into something like a piece of clothing.

Once Titania had tired of that however it seemed that she’d been content to have Mr. Flabtastic left more or less alone, since his massive size left him with a truly tremendous appetite that would make sure that he wasn’t able to escape any time soon. In his new supersize Reed wanted to eat something like five or six times as much as a normal human being did, and only the massive calorie packed meals that the Frightful Sumos had made just for him would provide Mr. Flabtastic with enough sustenance to keep him from spending every hour of the day looking for something else to eat.

As it was what he got was still only enough that a lot of the time Reed tended to sleep or if he wasn’t actually sleeping was at least spent with his body laying around in the shape of a formless blob in which case most people would barely be able to tell the difference.

As Reed awkwardly opened his brown eyes he now found himself face to face with none other than his wife Susan the Invisible Blimp! She was looking fat, but possibly a little bit skinnier than she had been before she’d gone into the challenge that Titania had set up which had lead to both of them getting captured and fattened up to the point of being the next best thing to utterly helpless flabby slaves.

“Susan… what is going on?” Reed asked awkwardly. It’d been a while since he’d actually needed to or been expected to talk to anyone and so he was a little bit out of practice. His entire body shook like a gigantic jello mold and began to ooze a little bit closer to Susan, torn between wanting to touch her in order to make sure that she was real, and not wanting to end up half smothering her beneath his blubber body.

“Just come a little closer and I’ll tell you Mr. Flabtastic...” Susan cooed with a seductive look in her eyes as she gazed deeply into her husband’s fattened face.

Reed obviously couldn’t refuse any request that Susan made of him at the moment and so began to ooze closer to her with renewed vigor, showing about as much enthusiasm as he had for anything ever since he got himself super-stuffed and fattened up to the point of being well and truly worthy of the title of Mr. Flabtastic...
1552122111121111121112112121212111111121.title: Check in with some of the other's in the ba...

choices: Titanic Gut wants tp use Reed's brilliant mind in some way...
Titanic Gut wants to use Reed's massive body in some way...
1552122111121111121112112121212111111121.content:
Reed oozed in and pressed himself tightly against the body of his wife. After a few moments however the bloated mass of blubber that was Reed Richards spoke again. "You're not really Susan..." He declared sounding surprisingly calm and collected despite the massive betrayal it implied, perhaps spending so much time as little more than a living blob of blubber had left him incapable of feeling much in the way of true anger.

Reed pulled back and the blond haired woman's body began to transform as her hair became bright red, her skin bright blue and yer eyes took on a golden yellow color to them, while her full body dark blue suit became instead a black bikini top and black panths as the woman who previously had been Susan Storm reverted into her true shape the body of the Raven Darkholme also known as the supervillainess Mystique.

Except that she went by Massivestique these days for obvious reasons as while she hadn't been one of the original Frightful Sumos she was still expanded up to roughly the same size as the other sumovillainesses, and seemed all the stronger and more confident for the transformation.

"How could you tell?" Raven couldn't help but ask, surprised that Reed had managed to see through her disguise.

"I felt Sue's body pretty much every inch and ounce she gained as she was turning herself into a sumoheroine, I have a pretty good feel for how she felt when she was fat, your version of my wife had too much bust and butt and not enough weight in her belly." Mr. Flabtastic answered calmly.

Massivestique shrugged and promptly sat herself down on top of Reed's bloated body.

"Can't fool everybody all the time I guess. Not that it really matters. Titanic Gut wants to see if I can get some use out of you rather than just having you laying around like a gigantic massive mush." Raven explained to the captive superhero.

"And what exactly does she have planned for me at the moment?" Reed couldn't keep himself from asking his naturally inquisitive mind found having a conversation with someone, even a supervillainess a much more interesting prospect than just sitting around gorging himself fatter and fatter and fatter, and even if she wasn't his wife there was still something calming and enjoyable about the feeling of Massivestique parking her plump posterior on top of Reed's bloated belly.

"Well Mr. Falbtastic it's like this..." The red haired villainess began.
